name: Инженер по качеству поставщиков ( VDA 6.3)
description:
Responsibility:

  • General operative duties for supplier quality management (SQM) in the location / factor;

  • Preparing quality reports for the BU SQM;

  • Involvement in the definition, implementation and development of the commodity organization and SQM-related processes;

  • Participation in realization of BU Commodity Roadmaps and SQM-related BU processes;

  • Involvement in the BU SQM-Network, e.g. personal participation in decision-making meetings;

  • Supplier quality management for series/project production and return of material (SCM) in the location / factory;
  • Evaluation and development of suppliers in the project phase. Commodity: casting, machined metal parts;
  • Implementation and controlling of an effective and efficient incoming goods inspection considering BU requirements;
  • Implementation and controlling of an effective complaints management including review of effectiveness of corrective measures performed at the supplier, e.g. by checking 8D reports in terms of content, supplier audits;
  • Regular analysis of supplier quality;
  • Support with fast and competent root cause failure analyses;
  • Support with technical knowledge when determining and implementing appropriate corrective measures at the supplier.

Requirements:

  • High technical education in automotive, machinebuilding or mechanical engineering;

  • Minimum 3 year experience in supplier quality work (Qualification of suppliers; parts; 8D, FMEA, Control plan, MSA, SPC methods, VDA 6.3 audits);

  • Good communication skils;

  • Team player;

  • English, intermediate level.

We offer:

  • Work in an international production company;
  • The level of salary is discussed individually;
  • Extended social package (medical insurance, food compensation, transport compensation);
  • Annual bonuses;
  • Opportunities for growth and development.
